# The `VPReductionRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe to represent inloop reduction operations, performing a reduction on a vector operand into a scalar value, and adding the result to a chain. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPReductionRecipe</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

VPSingleDef is a base class for recipes for modeling a sequence of one or more output IR that define a single result <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpsingledefrecipe/#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpreductionevlrecipe">VPReductionEVLRecipe</a></>}>
A recipe to represent inloop reduction operations with vector-predication intrinsics, performing a reduction on a vector operand with the explicit vector length (EVL) into a scalar value, and adding the result to a chain. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpreductionevlrecipe/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

A recipe to represent inloop reduction operations, performing a reduction on a vector operand into a scalar value, and adding the result to a chain.

The Operands are &#123;ChainOp, VecOp, &#91;Condition&#93;&#125;.

Definition at line 2659 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
